name: 林顯易
objective: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
schedule:
Lab0: Introduction to TI C2000 series DSP
Lab1: Introduction to CCS development environment 
Lab2: DSP command file
Lab3: How to write C code for DSP
Lab4: Memory
Lab5: Interrupt and timer
Lab6: FFT
Lab7: FIR
Lab8: IIR
Lab9: DCT
Lab10: Function generation, modulation and demodulation
Lab11: PWM (motor driver hardware)
Lab12: AD echo cancellation 
Lab13: Kalman filter 
Lab14: Speech quantization 
Lab15: Speech pitch detection
Lab16: Speech ADPCM 
Lab17: Image edge detection
Lab18: Image enhancement
Lab19: Image matching
